Uses of Class
controller.state.gamephase.GamePhase

  • Packages that use GamePhase 
    Package Description
    controller.state.gamephase.endphase
    End phase is set when just one player remains excluding neutralPlayer#1, winner is printed in this phase.
    controller.state.gamephase.gameplay
    Contains classes required to play the game like issue orders which takes orders from players, execute orders which executes the orders provided by players.
    controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup
    Contains methods used to set the necessary elements to play the game like load map, add or remove player and assigncountries.

    • Uses of GamePhase in controller.state.gamephase.endphase

      Subclasses of GamePhase in controller.state.gamephase.endphase 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EndPhase
      This is the class that inherits GamePhase class whose function is to print the winner of the game

    • Uses of GamePhase in controller.state.gamephase.gameplay

      Subclasses of GamePhase in controller.state.gamephase.gameplay 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AssignArmies
      AssignArmies class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
      class  ExecuteOrders
      ExecuteOrder class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
      class  GamePlay
      GamePlay class that inherits GamePhase to support gameplay compatible commands
      class  IssueOrders
      IssueOrder class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command

    • Uses of GamePhase in controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup

      Subclasses of GamePhase in controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GameSetup
      Abstract class of game setup the represents the initial process of enetering the gameplay
      class  PostLoad
      Phase entered after preload class, it contains methods to add or remove players from game and to assign countries randomly to players.
      class  PreLoad
      Phase entered after map is saved successfully or at the start of the game, it contains methods to load a map.
